pageContext.claim: “[Flynn] was an innocent man. He is a great gentleman. He was targeted by the Obama administration, and he was targeted in order to try and take down a President.”
pageContext.analysis: Flynn pleaded guilty in December 2017 to lying to the FBI. Plus, the Department of Justice approached the White House about Flynn's lies as soon as they knew he was lying to the Vice President (and later investigators). Flynn also admitted in the statement of offense to lying in March 2017 in his official lobbying disclosure forms about acting as an agent of the government of Turkey.
